definition: A measurement of vertical distance from a reference point to the highest point of an object or location. It is commonly used to describe the altitude or elevation of mountains, buildings, or other structures.

examples.german: Die Höhe des Turms beträgt 100 Meter.
examples.english: The height of the tower is 100 meters.

examples.german: Der Ballon stieg in große Höhen auf.
examples.english: The balloon ascended to great heights.

examples.german: Die Höhe des Preises überraschte alle.
examples.english: The amount of the prize surprised everyone.

examples.german: Die Höhe des Berges machte den Aufstieg schwierig.
examples.english: The height of the mountain made the ascent difficult.

examples.german: Die Höhe des Flusses schwankt je nach Jahreszeit.
examples.english: The level of the river varies depending on the season.
